start: ^Press the tapper on the left and the tapper on the right in quick succession to get through the flashback.
^If you succeed, you'll be able to go on to the next flashback.
failure: ^You don't quite have the hang of it, sorry.
^Let's try that again. Remember to hit the tappers in alternating succession to get through the flashback.
after_first_flashback: ^Congratulations! You're getting the hang of it.
^Your wife's death must have been painful for you. Let's try this again.
after_second_flashback: ^Those psychics must have been disturbing. But we need to go deeper.
after_third_flashback: ^That party.... oh no. There's something buried here, something even worse than I can imagine.
after_fifth_flashback: ^You killed the king. This is why you're having these nightmares.
